resources.string: Theme Name - YOUR ICONS NAME HERE
"This is the description of your theme that shows up under the About Theme section of the app!"
"Open this theme from the app drawer to change wallpaper, find me on social sites, rate theme, or just to check out my other themes!"
Specializes in - Icon Packs, Theme Chooser, and UCCW Skins

Born Roberto Mezquia Jr. Currently resides in Miami, FL. Sort of a jack-of-all traits. Automotive collision repair, trained. Business entrepreneur at heart. Started theming to get his phone exactly how he wanted it. Now spends more time doing it because he loves the creativity and challenges it brings.
Select your options and press Apply to finalize!

"ENTER YOUR TEXT HERE. https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=your.icons.name.here \n\n I PROMOTE MY APP HERE http://bit.ly/ZI34gC"
You also have my One-Stop-Shop App installed. n\n\ Be sure to visit that app for more themes and other downloads!
We have detected that you do not have my One-Stop-Shop App installed. n\n\ Would you like to download it for FREE now?
• Fixed ADW and Nova intents \n• Fixed a lot of references for various layouts and colors \n• Other Misc things

• File restructuring 
• Added Tablet Support 
• Changed code from ListView to GridView 
• Holo Light/Light ActionBar is the default instead of Holo Light/Dark ActionBar 
• Misc new images 
• Added Action Launcher to the Apply dialog

• Removed hardcoded strings. Now better for translations. 
• Custom fonts can now be used throughout the app 
• Cleaned up folders/files/code 
• Changed "Apply" dialog to GridView 
• Added more "Apply" buttons (for future implementation) 
• Fixed Wallpaper section of app 
• Roboto-Thin is now the default font 
• Fixed scaling on top banner across all screen sizes
• Added GlassActionBar to the template \n• Removed NOA dependency \n• Slightly tweaked layouts
• Fixed Nova and Go Launcher \n• Added working Go Launcher "Apply" button
• Added Changelog dialog on first run after install/update \n• NEW Section for showing off new icons \n• Overflow Menu added and some grid items moved to it
